reviews.review:
Начну обзор пожалуй с самого простого вопроса, покупать ли игру? НЕТ! На данный момент я рекомендую ни в коем случае не покупать игру, т.к на данный момент она невероятно дисбалансная, чтож начнем:
1.Маньяки убийцы и нечисть
Маньяки дисбалансы как только возможно, если вы играете против маньяка с хорошими перками и хотя бы не супер кривыми руками то вы мертвы.
2.Выжившие(сурвы)
Это п..здец полнейший хочу вам сказать, перки фиксят делают более не играбельными, большинство перков мусор.
3.Если вы не в тиме то готовьте очелло
Если вы играете за сурва в соло то вас удолетворят в задний проход по полной, вас спасать никто не будет, только либо ради фарма, либо перков.
4.Фиксы игры
Игру обновляют и это круто, но только для ебобаных маньяков так как их только баффают, а сурвов фиксят, и единственные особенные и крутые навыки просто делают бесполезными.
Я не рекомендую игру к покупке так как на данный момент за сурвов играть невозможно если против вас человек с прямыми ручонками.
一小时可以玩20把，一起来学时间管理！

бест оф зе бест гейм эвер лаги 10/10 их нету( есть и очень много). комюнити 10/10 очень хорошее ( нет ). берите если любите пожёсче. разрабы не ленятся уделяют много времени этой игре ( нет главное что много скинов) в общем чудо, а не игра 10/10 горящих пердаков и один Сильвестр Столовый
管一管外挂好吧？那么多屠夫开挂根本就没法玩，只管生不管养，那你必定不长久!
This game is extremely fun if you like run and chase kind of game, especially if played with friends but its pretty fun too if play by yourself but as killer. Have Fun!
Такой пздц, было очень много обновлений и теперь за людей играть невозможно. Без доната играть не как, да и с ним тоже....

บัคเยอะอยู่ แต่ก็ไม่ได้เกิดขึ้นทุกเกมหรอก รับได้อยู่ สิ่งที่รับไม่ค่อยได้น่าจะเป็นผู้เล่นมากกว่า แต่ก็คิดว่าเป็นสีสีนแหละ ได้เจอเพื่อนใหม่ๆเยอะเลย คนน่ารักๆเยอะอยู่ รวมก็โอเคแหละ

Recent Patch ruined the game.

Dev's ignored the constructive criticism from the community and several community contributers aka fog whisperers.

Nobody asked for a new UI, yet they implemented one. 
The new UI is all over the place and clutters the Screen from all sides, while making it hard to find necessary information without having 8 eyes. It's basically a mobile game UI. They push this, so they don't have to manage several UIs in the future.

It also looks fairly cheap with how the survivor pictures were added to it.

Yet everybody on PC and console hates the UI. There is no option to mod the UI or revert to the  previous one (which nobody had issues with)

New animations for survivors are supposed to look better. Yet they feel robotic and look broken. It's hard to tell at a glance if a survivor is injured or not. Before that was no issue.

Countless clipping bugs, where you can fully hide in walls on the updated maps, which were reported by many players as the PTR went up, still not fixed and went to live server.

Currently if the map has a Bus, the killer can't traverse through it, since he gets stuck on the ceiling of it.

Updated maps have countless new safe pallets, making any strategy and mindgaming impossible, taking all the fun out of playing survivor or killer. Gameplay is mindless. Just drop a pallet, run 6 meters, drop another and so on.

I've played this game for years. But recent patches made the game less fun and instead added countless bugs. We still have several bugs from a year ago in the game (e.g. totems spawning  in positions where you can't reach or cleanse them).

Ignorance, arrogance and incompentance from the Devs makes the game worse and not better. Several people suggested, they should increase the timespan between big patches to focus on bugs and really evaluate the PTR reports. 
Currently any constructive criticism or information gathered from the PTR seems to go right in the dumpster.

I bought all killer/survivor dlc until now. I will stop doing that and encourage everybody to do the same until devs start listening to paying customers.
Почти 35 Гб качать надо, а друзья зовут играть сейчас.(неудобно)

Jogo divertido.

MAS A COMUNIDADE É UM LIXO.

Sim, é ridículo. RI-DI-CU-LO...  São adolescentes com ego inflado que ditam regras para tudo. Jogar de Assassino é impossível. Quanto mais você joga, pior fica! 

Você não pode utilizar nenhuma vantagem, oferenda, Add-on ... Se o seu Add-on é de qualidade "rosa", te xingam de todas as maneiras. Se você está com uma Vantagem que os deixem em "desVantagem", também reclamam. Se você usa uma oferenda que permite executar um sobrevivente, também reclamam.

Em contrapartida, os sobreviventes usam os melhores equipamentos, add-ons e vantagens, além de jogarem com comunicação.

Recomendo pra você que joga casualmente, e provavelmente não chegará até os ranks altos. 
Caso contrário, é um Stress Simulator. 

Mas, a análise será positiva, pois foi um jogo que comprei há muito tempo e não me arrepende. (Com excessão da Comunidade).

=Edit=
Quem sofre de ansiedade, assim como eu, por favor, NÃO COMPRE o jogo. Estou falando sério. Da minha parte, ao terminar uma partida de killer, NUNCA fico sem que minhas mãos tremam e fiquem suadas. Os motivos já citei anteriormente: a comunidade. 
Existem jogos bem divertidos e legais pelo mesmo preço. 
Abraço.
Good game to play with friend

Mathieu öncelikle senin dikdörtgen kafanı sikeyim asosyal orospu çocugu. Zaman geçtikçe oyunun içine daha da sıçmayı başardılar. Sadece survivor oynayan down sendromlu orospu çocuklarına buradan selam olsun. Aynen kanka 10 deadhard atayım 78 palet atayım ama NOED gerçekten çok güçlü. 

Oyunun devi bile killer oynayamıyor bu bile başlı başına oyunu oynamamak için bir sebep olabilir.
Hatırlarsın Mathieu o koreliler ne taşak geçti senin hag oynayışınla değil mi lan çirkin orospu çocugu seni. Senin ananıallahınıskeym

Burdan blood lodgedaki tüm o 83 paleti Mathieu denen asosyal orospu evladının annesine armağan ediyorum.

Ted konuşmamı dinlediğiniz için teşekkürler.
If You Want To Be Thrilled And Scared This Is The PERFECT Game to play for those who want a scare!

despues de mas de 30 horas en el juego cambio mi reseña de positiva a negativa llegando a los rangos "rojos" en ranked  se vuelve asqueroso y insoportable el jugar siempre contra premades tanto como asesino como survi, si no tenes amigos que lo jueguen te va a durar poco el juego ya que resulta muy molesto llegando a ciertos rangos el jugar solo

Matchmaking will put you against people with a higher rank difference than the amount of ranks you have. Glitches abound that can screw you over. It is fun but highly unbalanced in favour of survivors. 

Would still recommend if you are a horror fan or have a high level of stress tolerance.

개 뒤져버린 게임 눈깔에 손전등 빵빵 쏘면 바로 실명될것이지 흑인새끼도 백인으로 만들 빛을 대가리에 쏴제껴도 실명은 커녕 눈깔 똑바로 뜨고 쫓아옴 진짜 손전등 씨빨 이럴거면 쳐 만들지를 말던가 차라리 차징 레일건 하나 쥐어주면 그거 쓰는게 더 편함 눈깔에 4초정도 갖다대야 실명하는 꼴 보니까 레일건 하나 차징해서 대가리 쏘는게 더 나을듯 
걍 싸빨 손전등 나오면 걸러라 줏같은거 싸발 그리고 죽기 살기 겨우 스킬 전승해놨더만 싸발거 이건 뭔 E키를 쳐 눌러도 도망을 못가요 싸발거 뒤에 빛 나면 딱 E키 누르면 되는데 다 씹힘 진짜 조오오오오옷같게 니미럴 싸발 성적 E 쳐받아서 게임 못만듬 싸발련들 그리고 왜 144hz 는 지원을 안하냐? 기능은 만들어놓고 옵션엔 없네 애애애애밈미

Cuando este juego entretenía... Da la sensación los últimos meses de que se preocupan más de sacar Skins que de solucionar los errores del juego (como son los hitbox) o de dar solución a comportamientos tóxicos dentro del juego como son el campeo, tuneleo y el genrush ya conocidos que hay, ya ni entro en los chats post partida. Terminarán por cargarse el juego los propios creadores de éste. Pretty goob job so far...
Dope although they need to do some tweaking and give the survivors more tools to survive 7/10

i will never condone this game or recommend it to anyone else, it starts off all fun and games at the very beginning while you're learning the ropes and dealing with inexperienced survivors and killers such as yourself but then you start dealing with the people that team up and have thousands of hours between them, its people like this that torment and abuse killers by exploiting this shit show of a game that ruin it for everyone else.

Survive with friends is the most toxic thing I've ever experienced, you plan on going after a single survivor and making your life easier? you're called a tunneller and berated for trying to win, you know there are survivors around the person you just hooked? you better stand 20 meters away and not dare come closer because they will belittle you and call you a camper for trying to have an edge against them. this game is the most unbalanced piece of trash that i've ever subjected myself too, near on 1000 hours down the drain because of a simple entertaining promise. 

Now don't get me wrong, i'll shit all over this game and will come back to it because BHVR are actually trying and continuously updating which grants them my respect but at this current stage of the game i neither like or respect the game itself.

If you plan on playing killer; good luck.
If you plan on playing survivor; better bring some good friends.

edit:

i've put a thousand more hours in and i still can't say it's good, your game is broken and shit, you prioritise new content over bug fixes which this game so desperately needs because instead of actually caring for your game and fanbase you need more money, you're a joke. BHVR is just as bad as every other game studio except others usually try and patch out their bugs. oh and just to inform you on how shit and awful they are, VHS another asymmetric video game is having a closed beta this weekend, guess who decides now is a good time for double bloodpoints? which we havent seen in roughly 8 months. BHVR i hope this game dies and i hope you don't make anymore video games.

i started playing dbd on mobile as a fun experiment with friends but we ended up falling in love with this fantastically terrifying  (in the best way) game! i highly recommend this game!  i also recommend the mobile version even though it does not have the same experience/full experience as the PC and console versions that,s what makes it good as well is it has a different but still fun experience tho its mobile. So i recommend both! i will say though if you want cross platform play that will not be the case but i hope it is in the future! The game is extremely addicting and will have you playing for hours non stop not to mention the iconic characters from horror franchises you can get and play as. I could keep going but it would be never ending so i just say i recommend this game! Worth every penny! 

P.S. if you love games such as myself that have constant updates i DEFINITELY recommend!
